name: WORD SEARCH 🕵️‍♂️
description:
WORD SEARCH  🔎

Are you a Word Search fan. Well this game is just for you.

Find Words in different categories of the game and solve the puzzle. 15 Categories - Ranging from Easy, Medium and Difficult. New levels will always be updated. 

How to play WORD SEARCH:
Slide your finger across the word that you find listed in the category to solve the  puzzle. 

To see all categories  slide up  🔼 or down  🔽 then choose difficulty level  and click  play  ▶ you can also pause ⏸ the game  and you have up to  3 hints to use  if in difficulty.

WORD SEARCH helps with your vocabulary, spelling , mental and puzzle solving skills .
This game is the best brain teaser for everyone. Try WORD SEARCH today.
